channel.title: STA 199: Intro to Data Science on STA 199
channel.description: Recent content in STA 199: Intro to Data Science on STA 199

item.description: Note: Due dates of exams and project will not move, however the timeline of topics and smaller assignments might be updated throughout the semester. Date Lesson Slides Reading Lab AE HW EC Exam Project Week 00 Wed, Jan 9 Welcome to Data Science Thur, Jan 10 Lab 00: Logistics UNIT 1: Visualizing and wrangling data Week 01 Mon, Jan 14 Meet the Toolkit Wed, Jan 16 Fundamentals of data & data visualization Thur, Jan 17 Lab 01: Hello R!

item.title: Policies
item.description: This page is under construction and will be updated soon. To uphold the Duke Community Standard: - I will not lie, cheat, or steal in my academic endeavors; - I will conduct myself honorably in all my endeavors; and - I will act if the Standard is compromised. Cheating on exams or plagiarism on homework assignments, lying about an illness or absence and other forms of academic dishonesty are a breach of trust with classmates and faculty, violate the Duke Community Standard, and will not be tolerated.
